name: Extrement
description:
Controls:
WS = Walk
QE = Strafe
AD = Turn
Enter = Interact

A Dark Souls inspired semi-open world RPG-like Crime solving simulator with horror and puzzle elements, as well as moral ambiguity, lovable characters, and secrets. Includes multiple unlockable endings.

Most NPCs have more dialogue when you talk to them multiple times, often revealing paths that you would otherwise never notice. Never leave a friend hanging :)
